    5) Important Notes 

    • Each daily reward can only be claimed once per account, but daily rewards may be claimed across multiple characters within the same account. 
    • Mini-game wins/first-place results are accumulated per account. 
    • The ‘Honorable Heroes’ Title Exchange Coupon can only be used starting September 18, 2025. Coupons obtained before this date cannot be exchanged until then. 
    • Event rewards cannot be claimed after the event period ends. 

     

    2. Fiesta Special MiniGame: Reverse Battle 

    A new board game is introduced in MiniGame Season 2.  

    Additional Fiesta Coins and an exclusive chair item can be obtained while experiencing the thrill of a comeback with strategic moves. 

     

    1) Event Period 

    August 21, 2025 (UTC+0) After the Maintenance ~ September 17, 2025, 23:59 (UTC+0) 

    2) Eligibility 

    Minted character that completed the ‘[Heroes Fiesta] Celebration for Heroes’ Quest 

    3) How to Participate 

    • After completing the ‘[Heroes Fiesta] Celebration for Heroes’ Quest, you can enter the event map “Hall of Heroes.” 
    • The available minigame will change every hour at 15 and 45 minutes past the hour between Reverse Battle and Monster Pyramid. Speak to Fiesta Twitch to join the queue for the current game. 

    4) Event Rewards 

    • Rewards can be obtained through the Fiesta Twitch in the exit map. 
    • Fiesta Coins can be obtained based on the game results. 

    Result

    Fiesta Coins

    Win

    40

    Draw

    20

    Lose

    10
    • During the Season 2 event period, completing a total of 100 games of Reverse Battle, Monster Pyramid, or Code Guessing will grant the Heart Jelly Bag SBT Chair. 

    5) How to Play 

    • The game begins with Slime taking the first turn, and players take turns placing stones on the board. 
    • You may only set down your stone if it jumps over at least one of your opponent’s stones. 
    • If your stone forms a straight line with another of your stones vertically, horizontally, or diagonally, any opponent stones in between are flipped to your color. This also deals damage to the opponent. 
    • Reduce your opponent’s HP to 0 within the 15-minute limit to win. 
      • If neither player can make a move, the player with more HP remaining wins. 

    6) Event Note

    • While penalized, you will be unable to claim rewards and will be restricted from joining minigames for 15 minutes. 
    • Regardless of the game, Fiesta Coins can be earned up to a maximum of 100 per account per day. 
    • Fiesta Coin rewards will be granted to the character that played the MiniGame.

     

     

    3. Fiesta Special MiniGame: Monster Pyramid 

    Cute monsters appear in MiniGame Season 2. 

    Additional Fiesta Coins and an exclusive chair item can be obtained by competing against opponents through strategic play. 

     

    1) Event Period 

    August 21, 2025 (UTC+0) After the Maintenance ~ September 17, 2025, 23:59 (UTC+0) 

    2) Eligibility 

    Minted character that completed the ‘[Heroes Fiesta] Celebration for Heroes’ Quest 

    3) How to Participate 

    • After completing the ‘[Heroes Fiesta] Celebration for Heroes’ Quest, you can enter the event map “Hall of Heroes.” 

    • The available minigame will change every hour at 15 and 45 minutes past the hour between Reverse Battle and Monster Pyramid. Speak to Fiesta Twitch to join the queue for the current game. 

    4) Event Rewards 

    • Rewards can be obtained through the Fiesta Twitch in the exit map. 
    • Fiesta Coins can be obtained based on the game results. 

    Ranking

    Fiesta Coins

    1

    40

    2

    20

    3

    10
    • During the Season 2 event period, completing a total of 100 games of Reverse Battle, Monster Pyramid, or Code Guessing will grant the Heart Jelly Bag SBT Chair. 

    5) How to Play 

    • A total of 36 monsters appear in Monster Pyramid. 
    • Three players are randomly assigned 12 monsters each. 
    • You can stack a monster if there is at least one monster of the same type directly beneath it. (The first floor can be stacked regardless of monster type.) 
    • When you select a monster to stack, the available positions will be highlighted. 
    • Special monsters can be stacked regardless of the type beneath them. 
    • No monster can be stacked on top of a special monster. 
    • On your turn, choose one of your monsters and stack it on the pyramid. 
    • A round ends when a player has placed all their monsters or when no player can make a move. 
    • The game is played over three rounds. Final rankings are determined by the total score after all rounds. 

    6) Event Note 

    • While penalized, you will be unable to claim rewards and will be restricted from joining minigames for 15 minutes. 
    • You can earn up to 100 Fiesta Coins per account per day, regardless of the type of game you participate in. 
    • Fiesta Coin rewards will be granted to the character that played the MiniGame. 

     

    4. Fiesta Special Minigame: Code Guessing 

    Test your deduction skills in Mini Game Season 2!  

    Take on the code-breaking challenge that requires both luck and skill, and earn extra Fiesta Coins along with a special chair item.

     

    1) Event Period 

    August 21, 2025 (UTC+0) After the Maintenance ~ September 17, 2025, 23:59 (UTC+0) 

    2) Eligibility 

    Minted character that completed the ‘[Heroes Fiesta] Celebration for Heroes’ Quest 

    3) How to Participate 

    • Click the invitation that appears above your character’s head to register for the queue. 
    • Invitations are sent every hour at 15 and 45 minutes past the hour. 

    4) Event Rewards 

    • Rewards can be obtained through the Fiesta Twitch in the exit map. 
    • Fiesta Coins can be obtained based on the game results. 

    Ranking

    Fiesta Coins

    1

    40

    2~5

    30

    6~10

    20

    11~20

    15

    21~30

    10

    31~70

    5
    • During the Season 2 event period, completing a total of 100 games of Reverse Battle, Monster Pyramid, or Code Guessing will grant the Heart Jelly Bag SBT Chair. 

    5) How to Play 

    • The game begins when 30 to 70 players have gathered. 
    • Each character receives a unique three-digit code. 
    • The entered code is compared to the correct answer, and the result is displayed. 

    ○: Correct number in the correct position 

    △: Correct number in the wrong position 

    Ｘ: Number not in the code 

    • Win by guessing the code faster than other players within 15 attempts.

    • A total of 3 rounds will be held, and Fiesta Coins are awarded based on your ranking. 

    6) Event Note 

    • Invitations cannot be received in the Heroes Fiesta map or certain other maps. Please stay in a town or a regular hunting area. 
    • You can earn up to 100 Fiesta Coins per account per day, regardless of the type of game you participate in. 
    • Fiesta Coin rewards will be granted to the character that played the MiniGame. 

     

    5. Heroes Fiesta  

    To welcome the arrival of new heroes in MapleStory N, new items are added to the Coin Shop. 

    By purchasing and using these items, you can participate in raffles for the corresponding heroes’ decoration items. 

    Using a Character Slot Expansion Coupon will increase your maximum character slots by 1, and the maximum number of character slots can currently be expanded up to 23. 

     

    1) Event Period 

    August 21, 2025 (UTC+0) After the Maintenance ~ September 22, 2025, 23:59 (UTC+0) 

    2) Newly Added Items 

    • Fiesta Luminous Style Raffle Coupon 
    • Fiesta Evan Style Raffle Coupon 
    • Fiesta Shade Style Raffle Coupon 
    • Character Slot Expansion Coupon 

    3) Important Notes 

    • Character that reached the coupon’s account purchase limit cannot purchase more coupons after transferring to another account. Only the characters that didn’t reach the purchase limit can purchase the coupons. 

    • When used, Raffle Coupons have the set probability for raffle participation and the set winning probability for rewards depending on the number of participants. 

    • Purchase limits and expiration periods vary by rewards. Please refer to the Heroes Fiesta Coin Shop Event Announcement for detailed information. 

     

    6. Heroes Fiesta  

    To celebrate the Heroes Fiesta, Aran will join the Call of Heroes, and the Call of Heroes skills are changed to Aran’s skills. 

     

    1) Event Period 

    August 21, 2025 After the Maintenance ~ September 17, 2025, 23:59:59 (UTC+0) 

    2) Eligibility 

    Minted characters who have completed <[Heroes Fiesta] Celebration for Heroes> 

    3) How to Participate 

    • From the event notifier on the left side of the screen, complete the <[Call of Heroes] Aran> quest for the appropriate stage to obtain “Lilin’s Call of Heroes – Aran” skill. 
    • While the skill is active, defeating monsters within your level range will fill up the Fever Gauge. Defeat 300 level-range monsters to trigger the Fever Skill. 
    • Using the Fever Skill allows you to defeat monsters and obtain more Rotation NESO in your current hunting field. 

    • You can earn instant bonus EXP gains up to 20 times per character per day when activating the Fever Skill. 

    4) Important Notes 

    • The 20 times per day limit applies only to the bonus EXP gains; the Fever Skill itself can be activated unlimited times.
      • The daily bonus EXP gains count resets at 00:00 UTC+0.
    • Lilin’s Call of Heroes can be toggled On/Off from the skill window by right-clicking. 
      • If you enter a field with level-range monsters and the skill icon does not appear on the top right of your screen, please check whether the skill is set to Off in the skill window. 
    • Bonus EXP gained from activating the Fever Skill are affected by EXP boost effects and EXP penalty effects. 
    • Monsters defeated with the Fever Skill do not count toward the 300 level-range monsters required to trigger Fever Skill again. 

     

     

    System Improvements

    1. Maximum Character Creation Slot Increased 

    • The maximum number of characters that can be created has been increased from 20 → 23. 
    • Character Slot Expansion Coupons can be purchased from the Fiesta Coin Shop and used by double-clicking the item. 

      

    2. Character Creation Limit Adjusted 

    • Updated the daily character creation limit reset time: every Thursday at 00:00 (UTC+0).   

      

    3. NFT Collection System Update 

    • The Maximum number of items that can be rebound at once through NFT Collection mass rebinding will be limited to 100.  
      • In the Mass Binding UI, selecting “Select All” will automatically select up to 100 items starting from the top of the list. 
    • If 100 items are already selected, you must deselect another item in order to select a different one. 

      

    4. Ability Preset Added 

    • The Ability Preset feature has been added, allowing you to conveniently switch between different ability setups. 
    • Ability Presets can be accessed from the Ability UI or the bottom of the Character Info window. 
    • A total of 3 presets are provided free of charge, and you can set or change them without any cost. 
    • Abilities apply according to the currently selected preset, and Abilities are not shared across presets; each preset must be set up individually. 
    • Ability Presets cannot be changed in certain fields, such as Boss fields. 

     

    5. Boss Contribution Notification System 

    • When entering a boss raid with two or more party members, the Contribution Status will now always be displayed. 
    • Rewards and systems affected by contribution are as follows.
      • If contribution is below 5%, you cannot obtain Life Ore from defeating the Ore Collector. 
      •  If contribution is below 5%, you cannot complete Heroes Fiesta weekly missions or Hero Boss Clear missions. 
        ※ Other rewards and systems are not affected by the contribution. 

    • How to Check Contribution Status

    • You can check your contribution status via the Party UI while in a party: 

     : Contributed less than 5% damage 

    : Contributed 5% – 10% damage 

     : Contributed 10% or more damage 

     

     

    Bug Fixes

    1. System  

    • Fixed an issue where unlinking was not possible even when no On-Chain Activity was in progress.  
    • Fixed an issue where enabling the [Display chat window outside the game window] option may cause problems when changing the resolution or switching to the character selection screen.  
    • Fixed an issue where attempting to equip both the Pivotal Adventure Ring and the Critical Adventure Ring simultaneously would cause the game client to close.  
    • Fixed an issue where “Decent” skills obtained from Item Potential Stats could still be used even after the item’s potential was changed.  
    • Fixed an issue where friend chat text color was not being saved.  
    • Modified the Party UI so that the “Chat Invite” button is no longer displayed.  
    • Fixed an issue where defeating the Easy Balrog boss monster did not count toward the [Defeat Daily Boss 0/3] daily mission in Heroes Fiesta.  
    • Fixed an issue where using Style Raffle Coupons and Fiesta Raffle Coupons did not increase the count shown on the Reward Dashboard.  
    • Fixed an issue where, upon obtaining a Luxury Pet, the chat message displayed incorrect information about the pet’s skills.  
    • Fixed an issue where completing Legion Assignment caused the Quest Notifier window to move to the front.  
    • Fixed an issue where Party Points were displayed during Spiegelette’s dialogue.  
    • Fixed an issue where the Legion UI could not be opened at the Entrance to Cave of Horntail.  
    • Fixed an issue where the Boost Raffle Effect persisted in the Reward Dashboard search.  
    • Fixed an issue where stat changes in the NFT Collection could not be applied if the required score sum was 0.  
    • Fixed an issue where certain buttons in the NFT Collection would slightly shift position when clicked.  
    • Fixed an issue where messages with line breaks were not displayed properly when picking up items. 
    • Fixed an issue where NESO minting records were not saved in the on-chain notifier.

    Inven公告


    메이플스토리, 신규 보스 '최초의 대적자' 업데이트


    자료제공 - 넥슨


    ㈜넥슨(공동 대표 강대현∙김정욱)은 21일 자사 인기 온라인게임 ‘메이플스토리’에 신규 보스 ‘최초의 대적자’를 포함한 여름 3차 업데이트를 실시했다.

    신규 보스 ‘최초의 대적자’는 ‘오디움’ 지역 스토리 퀘스트를 완료한 270레벨 이상 캐릭터로 도전할 수 있다. 이지, 노말, 하드, 익스트림 난이도에 최대 3인 파티로 참여할 수 있으며 처치 시 난이도에 따라 훈장 ‘불멸의 유산’, ‘익셉셔널 해머(훈장)’, ‘고대의 에테르넬 방어구 상자’, ‘대적자로이드’ 등의 보상을 획득할 수 있다.

    이를 기념해 9월 17일까지 ‘최초의 대적자’ 처치 이벤트 ‘시대를 초월하는 의지’를 진행한다. 전체 월드에서 익스트림 ‘최초의 대적자’를 격파한 선착순 3개 파티 구성원에게 ‘증명의 전장 커스텀 배경 교환권’ 및 ‘500만 메이플포인트 교환권’을 선물하며, 최초 격파 직후 전체 이용자에게도 ‘대적자의 머리장식 교환권’, ‘VIP 사우나 이용권 4개’ 등의 축하 보상을 지급한다. 또한 이벤트 기간 이지 난이도 이상의 ‘최초의 대적자’를 처치한 모든 이용자에게 난이도별 정해진 보상을 제공한다.

    이와 함께, 오는 10월까지 직업별 스킬 구조의 대규모 개선 작업을 순차 실시하고 전투 중 특수 스킬 반지를 편리하게 교체할 수 있는 '링 익스체인지' 스킬을 도입하는 등 전반적인 전투 경험을 개선한다. 뿐만 아니라, 21일 업데이트로 보스 처치 보상 시스템을 각 난이도에 맞춰 개편한다. 주간 보스 최대 처치 횟수를 12회로 제한하고, 노말 난이도 이상 '카링', '림보', '발드릭스' 처치 시 획득할 수 있는 보상에 '혼돈의 칠흑 장신구 상자'를 추가한다. 또한 '림보'와 '발드릭스'의 솔 에르다 지급량을 상향 조정한다. 더불어 익스트림 ‘스우’ 등 일부 주간 보스 마일리지 보상을 200에서 400으로 상향하는 등 전반적인 보스 처치 보상 구조를 다듬는다.

    이 밖에도, 9월 17일까지 신규 협동 이벤트 ‘블루밍 에버니아’를 진행한다. 전체 이용자가 협동해 레벨 범위 몬스터 처치로 ‘들꽃’을 모아 정해진 수집량에 도달할 때마다 ‘영겁의 황금 태엽’, ‘상급 EXP 교환권 2천개’ 등 정해진 전체 보상을 지급하며, 이때 개인 수집량에 따른 ‘VIP 부스터 20개’ 등의 개별 보상도 추가 제공한다. 같은 기간, 일반 몬스터 처치로 게이지를 충전하면 하루 최대 30회까지 몬스터 처치를 지원하고 추가 경험치를 제공하는 ‘소소리의 산책’ 신규 이벤트를 실시한다.

    또한, 채팅창, 친구, 파티 등의 UI를 개편하는 등 게임 이용 과정의 편의성을 높이는 각종 개선 사항을 적용한다. 이번 업데이트부터 200레벨까지 각종 게임 가이드와 초고속 성장을 지원하는 ‘테라 블링크’를 참여 조건 만족 시 상시 제공한다. ‘메이플 홈’ 콘텐츠에 신규 가구, ‘리미티드 라벨’ 진열장 가구, ‘메이플 홈 테마 추출권’을 도입하고, ‘제네시스’ 및 ‘데스티니’ 무기의 보유 및 재지급 과정을 개선한다.

    한편, 9월 18일까지 프리미엄 PC방 접속 시 다양한 보상을 제공하는 신규 이벤트를 진행한다. 일일 접속 시간에 따라 마일리지, ‘VIP 사우나 이용권’ 등을 제공하고 주말 접속 시 추가 보상을 지급한다. 더불어 총 누적 시간에 따라 ‘달콤한 정령(30일) 상자’, ‘카르마 블랙 큐브 30개’, ‘카르마 화이트 에디셔널 큐브 30개’를 추가 제공한다. 또, 9월 17일까지 레벨 범위 몬스터 처치로 ‘프리미엄 코인’을 모아 ‘솔 에르다’, ‘카르마 화이트 에디셔널 큐브’ 등과 교환할 수 있는 기프트샵을 운영하고, 운영 기간 PC방 접속 이용자에게 50% 추가 경험치 버프를 부여한다.

    ‘메이플스토리’ 신규 보스 ‘최초의 대적자’를 포함한 여름 3차 업데이트에 관한 더욱 자세한 내용은 공식 홈페이지에서 확인할 수 있다.
